includedAssets.title: Shrek
includedAssets.synopsis: Once upon a time there was an animated adventure that dared to take a traditional fairytale and give it that rare and wondrous thing: a sense of humour. And verily it was a ground-breaking, Oscar-winning treat, telling the story of a grumpy, green ogre (voiced by Mike Myers) who, together with a beautiful, butt-kicking princess (Cameron Diaz) and a motormouthed donkey (Eddie Murphy), stood up to a horrid little tyrant (John Lithgow). With gags coming from every direction (especially from the BAFTA-nominated Murphy) and a visual style all of its own, Shrek is truly a cause for celebration.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mike Myers is a grumpy ogre, Eddie Murphy a sassy donkey and Cameron Diaz a butt-kicking princess in this family fave.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Once upon a time there was an animated adventure that dared to take a traditional fairytale and give it that rare and wondrous thing: a sense of humour. With gags coming from every direction (especially from the BAFTA-nominated Murphy) and a visual style all of its own, Shrek is truly a cause for celebration.

includedAssets.title: Shrek 2
includedAssets.synopsis: It's time for odorous ogre Mike Myers to meet the new in-laws with his princess bride Cameron Diaz. Animated antics with the voices of Antonio Banderas and Eddie Murphy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Animated adventure sequel, with the voice of Mike Myers
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's time for odorous ogre Mike Myers to meet the new in-laws with his princess bride Cameron Diaz. Animated antics with the voices of Antonio Banderas and Eddie Murphy.

includedAssets.title: Shrek The Third
includedAssets.synopsis: The grumpy ogre returns for more fairytale fun and games as Shrek deals with impending fatherhood and the call to be King of Far Far Away. Star-studded animated sequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Animated sequel, with the voice of Mike Myers
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The grumpy ogre returns for more fairytale fun and games as Shrek deals with impending fatherhood and the call to be King of Far Far Away. Star-studded animated sequel.

includedAssets.title: Shrek Forever After
includedAssets.synopsis: A dodgy deal with Rumpelstiltskin leaves the grumpy ogre in a bizarre parallel version of the land of Far Far Away. Fantastic final adventure for Shrek and the gang.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Animated comedy, with the voice of Mike Myers
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A dodgy deal with Rumpelstiltskin leaves the grumpy ogre in a bizarre parallel version of the land of Far Far Away. Fantastic final adventure for Shrek and the gang.

includedAssets.title: Shrek Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: A grouchy ogre (Mike Myers) sets out to rescue a beautiful princess (Cameron Diaz) with the help of his trusty 'steed' (Eddie Murphy). Later, he meets his new in-laws (John Cleese and Julie Andrews) and prepares for fatherhood, before finding himself at odds with the devious Rumpelstiltskin. Star-studded Oscar-winning smash-hit franchise from the studio behind Madagascar and Kung Fu Panda.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A grouchy ogre (Mike Myers) finds his quiet life transformed by a talkative donkey (Eddie Murphy) and a beautiful princess (Cameron Diaz).
